# Notebook general settings
```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

# Set options
```{r}
inputfile = "test/tests.xlsx"
worksheet = "dead"
count_unaccounted = "auto"        # auto / yes / no
```

# Process data
```{r include=FALSE}
devtools::load_all("flies", reset=T)
result = flies::process(inputfile, worksheet, count_unaccounted)
```

# Results

## Tally
```{r}
result$tally
```

## Graph
```{r}
flies::plot(result)
```
